OUTLINE : Patients receive oral CHS 828 every 3 week . Treatment continue least 2 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 3-6 patient receive escalate dos CHS 828 maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) reach . The MTD define dose 2 6 patient experience dose limit toxicity . Patients follow 4 week .
